languages.text: Изувеченные тела пленников слиплись в массивную кучу, источающую едкий гнилостный запах.
The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.
languages.original_text: Изувеченные тела пленников слиплись в массивную кучу, источающую едкий гнилостный запах.

traits.locale_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.
The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.
The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.
The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.
The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

languages.text: 囚犯们的尸体遭到了肢解，各种各样的肢体高高地堆在一起，散发出可怕的腐烂味道。
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: 囚犯们的尸体遭到了肢解，各种各样的肢体高高地堆在一起，散发出可怕的腐烂味道。

languages.text: Die verstümmelten Leichen der Gefangenen sind zu einem großen Haufen verschmolzen, der einen beißenden Gestank der Verwesung verströmt.
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: Die verstümmelten Leichen der Gefangenen sind zu einem großen Haufen verschmolzen, der einen beißenden Gestank der Verwesung verströmt.

languages.text: Les corps mutilés des prisonniers ont fusionné en un amas de cadavres qui dégage une forte odeur de décomposition.
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: Les corps mutilés des prisonniers ont fusionné en un amas de cadavres qui dégage une forte odeur de décomposition.

languages.text: Los cadáveres mutilados de los prisioneros se han fundido en un montón que desprende un olor cáustico a podredumbre.
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: Los cadáveres mutilados de los prisioneros se han fundido en un montón que desprende un olor cáustico a podredumbre.

languages.text: 囚人の切り刻まれた遺体は融合して大きな山となり、腐食性の腐臭を放っている。
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: 囚人の切り刻まれた遺体は融合して大きな山となり、腐食性の腐臭を放っている。

languages.text: Mahkûmların tahrip edilmiş bedenleri; yakıcı bir çürük kokusu yayan, büyük bir yığın meydana getirmiş.
languages.original_text: The mutilated bodies of the prisoners have fused together into a large pile that gives off a caustic smell of rot.

traits.locale_text: Mahkûmların tahrip edilmiş bedenleri, yakıcı bir çürük kokusu yayan büyük bir yığına dönüşmüş.
